name: NSQIP_CONCUR_PROCS
description: The NSQIP_CONCUR_PROCS table contains information about concurrent procedures associated with the surgery. Concurrent procedures are additional procedures on a surgery that are performed by a surgeon with a different service from the service of the surgeon performing the principal operative procedure. This table is used in conjunction with NSQIP_INFO to provide NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_CONCUR_PROC
columns.description: The name of the concurrent procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_CONCUR_CPT
columns.description: The CPTï¿½ code of the concurrent procedure.
